content.text: Hi, I'm a big fan of Ender's Game. What's your favorite book?
Hi! My favorite book that I've read recently is Middlesex. It's a really interesting book about a person's gender identity.
I've heard of that book! I've been meaning to read it. What kind of music do you like?
I like most music except for country and jazz. I'm a big fan of rock and electronic music.
Me too! I love rock and electronic music. What's your favorite food?
I love Italian food! I'm a big fan of pizza, pasta, and gelato.
Me too! I love Italian food. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to work out and play racquetball. I'm also a big fan of watching TV.
I love working out too! I'm not much of a TV person, but I do like to watch Jeopardy.
Me too! Jeopardy is my favorite show.
It's a great show. It's so challenging.
It is! I love trying to answer the questions.
Me too! It's so much fun.
I'm glad we have so much in common.
Me too! It's nice to meet someone who shares my interests.
